home_loggedout.action_button: zarejestruj się teraz ta dołącz do {players_online} użytkowników!
home_loggedout.direct_text: Wyszukaj ta pobieraj beatmapy prosto w grze
home_loggedout.pp_systems: PP system dla takich modów jak relax ta autopilot
home_loggedout.pp_systems_text: Spróbuj i zobacz, jak daleko zajdziesz! Albo może pofarmuj trochę pp?
home_loggedout.leaderboards_text: Otwarty dostęp do rankingów za wybranymi modami, listy znajomych ta rankingów krajowych

register.note_message: Please, activate your account by logging in from the game.
register.note_attention: Do not leave this page until you have activated your account!
register.note_stuck: Stuck? Need help? Read this article:
register.note_success: You have successfully activated your account!
register.note_success_hint: You will be logged in shortly and redirected to the main page.

recaptcha.invalid: You didn't pass the captcha. You are a robot, aren't you?

username.min: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
username.max: Username must be at most 16 characters long.
username.invalid: The username must contain Latin letters and numbers only.

password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
password.max: Password must be at most 32 characters long.

email.invalid: Email must be a valid email address.
email.exists: Email is already taken. Try to login or reset your password.

recaptcha.agreement: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service apply.
